title: "Metallic Future Vision"
content:
Welcome to Metallic Future Vision, a website that explores the intersection of technology and humanity. Our mission is to provide you with insights into the latest advancements in robotics, artificial intelligence, and cybernetics, and to explore the ethical implications of these technologies.

Our team of experts brings together diverse perspectives from the fields of science, philosophy, and engineering to offer you a unique perspective on the future of humanity. We believe that technology has the power to transform our world for the better, but only if we approach it with care and consideration for its impact on society.

Join us as we delve into the cutting-edge research and development taking place in labs around the world, and examine the ways in which these technologies are already shaping our lives. Whether you're a scientist, a futurist, or simply someone interested in the latest developments in technology, you'll find something to fascinate and inspire you here at Metallic Future Vision.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An illustration of a cyborg with a metallic body and glowing eyes"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
